name: Introducing Aurelia Weekly
description: Today we're excited to launch our official weekly Aurelia newsletter. Each week we'll be featuring Aurelia announcements, events, articles, community surveys and important web industry news. If you haven't already signed up, you can get on the list here [http://eepurl.com/ces50j]. We're thrilled to have Aurelia Core Team member Andreas Wänqvist [https://github.com/mobilemancer] putting together this great content on a regular basis and we look forward to hearing your feedback.
content:
Today we're excited to launch our official weekly Aurelia newsletter. Each week we'll be featuring Aurelia announcements, events, articles, community surveys and important web industry news. If you haven't already signed up, you can [get on the list here](http://eepurl.com/ces50j). We're thrilled to have Aurelia Core Team member [Andreas Wänqvist](https://github.com/mobilemancer) putting together this great content on a regular basis and we look forward to hearing your feedback.

If you missed this week's issue, [you can find it online here](http://mailchi.mp/bluespire/aurelia-weekly-issue-1).
